events.message: I ordered a smartphone two weeks ago, but the delivery is still late and I haven't received any tracking updates.
The customer's message indicates a shipping delay with no tracking information received.
Support agent assigned to handle the customer's delivery delay inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your delayed smartphone delivery issue.
Could you please provide your order number and any previous tracking information you received to assist you better?
My order number is 123456789. I haven’t received any tracking emails or updates since placing the order.
Thank you for the details. I have contacted our shipping partner to locate your package and expedite the delivery. We will update you within 24 hours.
Okay, I appreciate the prompt response. I look forward to the update about my delivery status.
Your package is now in transit and should arrive by tomorrow. We apologize for the delay and appreciate your patience.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your smartphone and if everything is satisfactory with the delivery.
Yes, I received the phone yesterday, and everything is perfect now. Thank you for your assistance!
We are glad to hear that your order arrived safely. Closing the case but feel free to reach out if you need further help.
Sending a brief satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on our support service.
